entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:12 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
